thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Anastasia

author: Anastasia
title: Anastasia
text: I dealt with Georgia as well as Aly to create an epic trip to Australia. She had us spend time in the Cook Islands, as well as an extended layover in Auckland. She booked many of excursions, hotels and offered a ton of great information. Even dealing with a delay in flights that meant departing 4 days later, (AC fault), everything in her control she followed through well. Had a blast and am spoiled forever!
